snippet: Some 300,000 individuals and entities in New York State no longer have to make the nuisance payments, which were eliminated by Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo.
abstract: New York State budget package includes repeal of dozens of small charges levied on businesses; fees affected around 300,000 businesses but only generated about $3 million for state.
lead_paragraph: Some 300,000 individuals and entities in New York State no longer have to make the nuisance payments, which were eliminated by Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo.

headline.main: New York State Erases Fees Seen as Nuisances to Business
headline.print_headline: State Erases Fees Seen as Nuisances to Business
